programme.desc: In Lagos Nigeria, 17% of the state is composed of waterways and lagoons. But water transportation is highly underutilized, despite poor road infrastructure and traffic congestion. Now, the state actively seeking to develop its waterways network through public ferries and private operators as well as a partnership with the international boat racing franchise E1, with the first African E1 event taking place in October. E1 is also looking to grow their presence on the continent through digital education and outreach, something that is launching in tandem with the event in October. We take a look at the challenges and opportunities of developing Lagos' waterways, and the potential economic boost of tapping into the region's blue economy. Also, Aspen Global CEO Samer Kassem sits down to discuss the biopharmaceutical giant's growth strategy and the markets he believes will grow in the coming years./The World Travel Market unites industry leaders to take on the biggest challenges and trends in global tourism. From AI and sustainability, to customer service and changing traveler demands, we speak to some of the key figures in European travel to find out how our vacations will evolve in the coming years.

programme.title: Inside Africa: ?Inside Africa's 25th Anniversary: Lupita & Angelique at the Met
programme.desc: As part of?Inside Africa's?25th anniversary, we have a sit-down between two of the continent's most celebrated voices: Angelique Kidjo?and Lupita Nyong'o. The setting is The Met's newly reimagined?Arts of Africa?gallery, a powerful space in which to reflect on African creativity, identity, and legacy. Five-time Grammy award winning Kidjo and Oscar-winning actor Nyong'o reflect on their careers and the rise and influence of African culture across the world.

programme.title: Intelligent Future: Intellligent Future - Abu Dhabi: City of the Future
programme.desc: The world's smartest cities are built on an audacious blend of creativity, investment and foresight. As Abu Dhabi redesigns itself, we discover how transformative technologies are reshaping the way cities work, move, and sustain themselves. Becky Anderson explores the innovations driving her home's rise on the global Smart City Index,. We go behind the scenes for the launch of the latest version of TAMM, the world's first transactional AI servant streamlining 1,100 public services, explore Presight's smart city systems, and visit Masdar City, where new technologies like VOLT's home energy storage are powering a sustainable future.

programme.title: Cobra Kai
programme.desc: Johnny prepares his Cobra Kai students for the next All Valley Karate Tournament and in turn, he is inspired to clean up his life. Daniel is still unaware of his new pupil's background.

programme.title: Cobra Kai

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2

programme.title: Biyaheng Langit
programme.desc: After Bea (Joyce Jimenez) loses her money in the casino, she tries desperately to regain her capital by trying her luck in gambling and using her car as collateral. Danny (Mark Anthony) is the liaison between the gambling lord and the collector at the casino.

programme.title: Wangbu
programme.desc: Dodong (Jay Manalo) moves his family to Manila in search for a better life. But his dream for a brighter future starts crumbling when he catches his son sniffing solvent.

programme.title: Kusina
programme.desc: "Kusina" is the silent witness to the life and love of Juanita. It is her sanctuary, the place where she creates dishes for her family, her friends, even enemies and strangers. Through cooking, she gets to know the people around her, and in return, reveal herself to them.

programme.title: Bulaklak ng Maynila
programme.desc: It’s a world where crime is common place but money is scarce. It’s a place where the strong is king and the weak is prey. Welcome to Ada’s (Angelu de Leon) world.

programme.title: Kulimlim
programme.desc: The past has come to haunt Jake Cabrera. Based on technicality, the Supreme Court has ordered the release of the three men convicted of raping his wife after eight years in prison. Jake decides to render his own brand of justice and seeks the help of a retired colonel. This is Robin Padilla's finest dramatic performance yet.

programme.title: Mainit Na Tubig
programme.desc: This is a story of a widower (Phillip Salvador) who entrusts his daughter (Sofia Gwenn) under the care of his younger brother (Mike Lloren) when he does time in jail. Father and daughter have a difficult time adjusting to each other, especially since the child shows a rather strange behavior toward him.

programme.title: Swipe
programme.desc: When CCTV cameras are installed in Sunrise Apartment, the tenants’ lives begin to unravel through their discreet activities in social media dating sites.

programme.title: Pagbabalik ng Probinsyano
programme.desc: The small town’s police chief finds his small contingent of native cops threatened by a huge army of security guards and goons who will stop at nothing to get what they want.

programme.title: It's Cool Bulol
programme.desc: Red Sternberg stars as a campus nerd who has always been wanting to be accepted for what he is. He's smart, alright, but in an environment where substance takes a backseat to style, he is everybody's favorite laughingstock.

programme.title: Untrue
programme.desc: A bruised and beaten wife named Mara (Cristine Reyes) seeks the help of Georgian police against her husband Joachim (Xian Lim). In this He-she said film, truths, lies and the dark past will be uncovered.

programme.title: Basagan ng Mukha
programme.desc: Basagan ng Mukha

programme.title: You Changed My Life
programme.desc: Laida and Miggy's happy relationship was tested when they’re both promoted to jobs that will take them away from each other. Though their connection remains strong, the distance takes its toll on their relationship, and as their career takes them on different paths, the two are forced to reassess their priorities.

programme.title: Just A Stranger
programme.desc: A story of a woman and a man, half of her age being in love with each other despite the fact that they are both tied with someone else.

programme.title: CSI S4 E02 - All For Our Country
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.desc: Chef Eric Adjepong has a big smile on his face as he takes on his friends, Bobby Flay's Titans.

programme.title: Guy's All-American Road Trip (S2)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri and his caravan start their epic journey through Appalachia with an ice cream-making contest at a dairy and a pizza showdown at the campground.

programme.title: Good Eats (S15)
programme.desc: Alton Brown takes a deep dive on shakshuka by way of a famous film from the 1940s. He also takes a closer look at preserved lemons and homemade harissa.

programme.title: Good Eats (S15)
programme.desc: Alton Brown journeys through the history and science of the greatest of all raw meat dishes: steak tartare. Plus, he serves up a delicious ahi tuna poke.

programme.title: 30 Minute Meals (S29)
programme.desc: Rachael Ray makes a quick and easy fish recipe to fall for hook, line and sinker. Her crispy, battered Fishwiches pair perfectly with creamy Yogurt Tartar Sauce.

programme.title: 30 Minute Meals (S29)
programme.desc: The secret to Rachael Ray's Japanese-style skewers is the thick, sweet and savory sauce.

programme.title: Cheap Eats (S5)
programme.desc: Ali Khan can't resist a red velvet whoopie pie and low country boil in Savannah, GA.

programme.title: Cheap Eats (S5)
programme.desc: Ali Khan is in Charlotte, NC, hunting down deals on waffles, sliders and ramen gumbo.

programme.title: The Kitchen (S38)
programme.desc: Jeff Mauro is making wings two ways with Fried Honey Miso Wings and Oven Baked Sweet and Spicy Cherry Pepper Wings.

programme.title: Outrageous Pumpkins (S4)
programme.desc: The final four carvers sculpt pageant monsters. Then, they create massive Halloween parade floats to win $25,000 and the prize belt!

programme.title: Andres Manambit: Angkan Ng Matatapang
programme.desc: The true story of a law enforcer who did everything he could to uphold the law.

programme.title: Maging Sino Ka Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Together in a remote barrio, Sharon and Robin discovered love and the children found themselves a home. But first they must settle the matter of her money-hungry relatives and Robin must learn to accept Sharon's real self.

programme.title: Cara Y Cruz
programme.desc: Berting was an escaped convict. Boggart was a cab driver whom he took hostage when he bolted from jail. The two of them landed in a primitive island where all of the inhabitants were under the control of a religious cult.

programme.title: Grease Gun Brothers
programme.desc: Better known as the Grease Gun Brothers. Ramon (Dante Varona) and his brothers Rodrigo (Rey Malonzo), Romeo (Bembol Roco) and Renato (Roy Flores) play modern-day Robin Hoods to their urban poor community.

programme.title: Paradise Inn
programme.desc: A story about the relationship between a mother and her daughter in a situation where everybody is a snake and with vested interest.

programme.title: Macho Dancer
programme.desc: Pol came to the big city in search of a better life, but instead, he encountered the harsh reality, which would take more than dreams to survive.

programme.title: Extranghero
programme.desc: After causing a series of troubles in his hometown, Botong (Andrew E) leaves for Manila to look for his long-lost mother. But he ends up in a mental asylum where he meets the beautiful Kristy.

programme.title: Kakampi Ko Ang Diyos
programme.desc: A friend entrusted Ronnie with an image of the Infant Jesus. Unknown to him, the image contained papers which would endanger the country.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Nating Hagkan Ang Nakaraan (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Helen looks like a woman who has everything anybody could want-a beautiful house, a loving husband, and a baby on the way.

programme.title: Tong-Its
programme.desc: Two popular figures in the local music scene, pop singer, Janno Gibbs and master rapper, Francis Magalona teamed up in this comedy about two cops who enjoyed playing a game Tong-its, a popular type of card game.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the "house-band" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: ANIME MANGA EXPLOSION
programme.desc: Join us for a look at bones, the anime studio known for stunning action and works like Gachiakuta and My Hero Academia FINAL SEASON. Charismatic animator Nakamura Yutaka also makes his TV debut.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: cocolashika (a guitarless trio getting lots of attention for their city-pop sound) and Utagokoro Rie (a singer whose J-pop covers led to major-label debut).

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-11.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: In Japan, sweet potatoes are often baked or turned into sweets. But they can also be used to generate electricity or protect from heat. We introduce the diverse ways in which they are used and sold.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Two herb farmers' cats live next door to each other. Their relationship is tense due to a past fight. At Takeya Kannonji Temple, the chief priest lives with four cats that always stay by his side.

programme.title: Empowering kids through song
programme.desc: A Brazilian woman living in Japan is trying to promote a music video she made for kids about sexual abuse while navigating the differences between the two cultures.

programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Global warming has raised sea temperatures, increasing powerful typhoons worldwide. The program reports on their impacts and explores with experts the mechanisms and causes of their intensification.

programme.title: Propellers: Unwavering Rationality
programme.desc: Okayama / Hara Kenya (graphic designer) Hara visits a Japanese propeller maker with a 30% global market share, to discover the merit of finding an object's perfect shape, without compromise.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Afghani Gulhabib Habiby who takes care of cattle on a farm in Kanoya, Kagoshima Prefecture, and Nepalese Rukesh Raj Giri who runs a produce store in Tokyo.

programme.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your
programme.desc: Massive logistics facilities underpin online retail, but their robust warehouse structures, state-of-the-art seismic isolation systems and other features make them suitable as evacuation sites too.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: The Comedy Club Where I Belong
programme.desc: In a stand-up comedy club in Tokyo, people from all over the world try out bilingual jokes. For James from Australia, comedy has changed his life, helping him find a place where he feels he belongs.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: A sumo tournament is being held in London for the first time in 34 years. At a screening of Grand Sumo Legends, Wajima: The Golden Left, attendees can learn about NHK WORLD-JAPAN's useful services.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: YONEZAWA: A Gift from Melted Snow
programme.desc: As snow melts in Yonezawa, it provides water used for growing rice. Beautiful time-lapse images show how a 400-year-old brewery turns this rice into sake, using human expertise instead of machines.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Japanese pond turtles are a near-threatened species. But a six-month tracking project revealed that they flourish in rice paddies, woods and fields. Take a close look at their surprising lives.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve, performers dress as monsters called namahage. It's a good-natured tradition that strengthens family and community bonds. And in the village of Tayazawa, it was recently revived.

programme.title: JAPAN DELISH 5min.
programme.desc: Japanese festival favorite, yakisoba! Noodles cooked in a special sauce. Enjoy local yakisoba from all over Japan!

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs make butterbur miso. Just boil butterbur shoots, then grind with sugar, mirin and white miso. The taste is slightly bitter, but perfect for early spring.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 23, Day 15 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about ritto and shosetsu, two dates of early winter. The nuns teach us how to make seasonal pickles and dumplings.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Odachi, a giant sword that showcases a swordsmith's astonishing expertise.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Iwate Prefecture is home to many historic sites which were made to represent Buddhist paradise. Catch a glimpse of eternity through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Afghani Gulhabib Habiby who takes care of cattle on a farm in Kanoya, Kagoshima Prefecture, and Nepalese Rukesh Raj Giri who runs a produce store in Tokyo.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5 20
programme.desc: J.J. LaRoche personally requests Jane's help when the mysterious container he's had hidden in his safe for nine years is stolen from his home.

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: Comic superstar Steve Carell takes on the role of Agent Maxwell Smart and Anne Hathaway steps into the shoes of sexy Agent 99 as the two superspies out to save the world from the nefarious forces of KAOS in this romp based on the classic television show created by Mel Brooks and Buck Henry.

programme.title: King Arthur: Legend Of The Sword
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Guy Ritchie brings his dynamic style to the epic fantasy action adventure "King Arthur: Legend of the Sword." Starring Charlie Hunnam in the title role, the film is an iconoclastic take on the classic Excalibur myth, tracing Arthur's journey from the streets to the throne. When the child Arthur's father is murdered, Vortigern (Jude Law), Arthur's uncle, seizes the crown. Robbed of his birthright and with no idea who he truly is, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, his life is turned upside down and he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy...whether he likes it or not.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust no one. Deceive everyone. When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris (Di Caprio -- The Departed, Blood Diamond) is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen.

programme.title: Er S1 23
programme.desc: Greene and the new chairman clash over an attempted suicide; Greene feels he is losing his wife.

programme.title: Er S1 24
programme.desc: Lewis delivers her sister's baby. Ross jeopardizes his relationship with Diane. Carter doesn't accept a position in the ER, as he believes he will be offered a surgical position.

programme.title: Friends S6 17
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica agree to give each other homemade presents for their six-month anniversary.

programme.title: Friends S6 18
programme.desc: When a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe must choose between living temporarily with Joey or Monica. Ross gets into trouble by dating a student. Chandler tries to help Joey's career.

programme.title: Friends S6 19
programme.desc: Ross worries when his student/girlfriend goes on vacation with her wild friends. Rachel needs a date for a ball. Joey's refrigerator breaks down.

programme.title: Friends S6 20
programme.desc: In this episode primarily composed of clips from earlier shows, Joey auditions for a major television role. But Chandler almost ruins everything by forgetting a telephone message.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 5
programme.desc: A rocket scientist, a social media guru and the Lebron James of Dodgeball compete for a final spot.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 6
programme.desc: Exploding balls, a barrage of buckshot and more plague those competing for a shot at the prize.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 7
programme.desc: A deceptive ninja faces off with royalty for one of two spots left in the Tournament of Champions.

programme.title: Dodgeball Thunderdome S1 8
programme.desc: A dancing accountant takes on a bouncing boater and a shooter faces a man-child with moves.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 1
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys return to White Castle to serve up a new round of mischief, pose as bouncers at a nightclub, and offer phony horoscope readings in a mall.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 2
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys try to sell diamonds to unsuspecting couples ready to tie the knot, and pose as members of a very unwelcoming committee down at the boardwalk.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 7
programme.desc: This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 1
programme.desc: The White House senior members handle difficult situations.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Loving Gluten Free - Episode 4
programme.desc: Christina Glentis and Luke Lucas run Foddies in Camberwell, which caters to dietary requirements and low FODMAP patrons. Together they show Helen a recipe that incorporates gluten free pita bread.

programme.title: Palisa Anderson's Water Heart Food - Humble Origins
programme.desc: Palisa Anderson explores her passion for cooking with fresh, seasonal and local produce; she catches up with food author Christine Manfield and the renowned Peter Gilmore of Sydney's Quay Restaurant.

programme.title: The Streets with Dan Hong - Episode 3
programme.desc: Dan Hong sets out to unearth iconic national street food dishes, tracing them back to their roots and then preparing them himself.

programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.desc: The untold story of how a band of renegade surfer girls in the 1980s fought to create their own professional sport, changing surf culture forever.

programme.desc: Australia take on England in the First Ashes Test. Abbey Gelmi and the panel are live in Perth to dissect all the on field action and off field drama in one of the greatest sporting rivalries.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 41
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.desc: Australia take on England in the First Ashes Test. Abbey Gelmi and the panel are live in Perth to dissect all the on field action and off field drama in one of the greatest sporting rivalries.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - One-on-one with Hopoi Taione
programme.desc: Sam Wykes sits down with the legendary Hopoi Taione. Hopoi was the first Tongan and non-Japanese player to play internationally for the Japanese national rugby team in the 1980s. This is a one-on-one special episode.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 234
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 234
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 234
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 2
programme.desc: Derek starts out with a fun way to harvest cabbages, he then helps prepare smoked meats, and helps a beekeeper put a queen bee into a new hive! Then we hear special sounds of two didgeridoo's in the Boranup Forest.

programme.title: Field To Feast - Episode 7
programme.desc: Thanh unearths some of the secrets behind this emerging vegetable that is very popular internationally. Thanh then enjoys a traditional home-cooked, African dish that features Okra as the star.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces - Remote Snappers
programme.desc: Ever wished you could ditch the office job for something a bit more magical? For two young Australians, their day jobs involve swimming with dolphins in the Gulf of Carpentaria and sleeping under the stars in the outback.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s - Gaining The Edge
programme.desc: New bat technology, the key to reverse-swing, slow bowling and team culture are all crucial elements in a quality team's march to victory. This episode reveals the ways teams playing in the '80s found that winning edge.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - Prahran Boarding
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke joins a young couple, Steph and Paul, as they set out bravely and optimistically to write a happy, luxe new chapter for a storied 150-year-old Melbourne institution.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 216
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 216
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Behave
programme.desc: Following the death of their friend, a group of young adults travels to a villa on the outskirts of London that contains a deep mystery. As unsettling events escalate during their luxurious stay, they must unravel the villa’s dark secrets.

programme.title: Anak Perjanjian Syaitan 2
programme.desc: Haunted since childhood, orphan Azlinda believes her torment stems from her parents' dark history. Her friends Zurina, Wati, and Ustaz join forces to end her suffering, but a malevolent demon interrupts their efforts. Will Azlinda succeed in severing the cursed ties that bind her, or is she destined to remain trapped in darkness forever?

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years…

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Lonely Ah Zhen is bullied by his coworkers. When he spends his birthday with Yumi, his friends shockingly discover that Yumi is an inflatable doll. Seeking companionship, Ah Zhen turns to the internet and finds his ideal girl Mina. Her arrival transforms his life but a series of unexpected events unfold as her identity as a vampire is revealed.

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.desc: After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves to a new town, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good. // When SpongeBob accidentally picks up Neptune's magic trident, there's no telling what trouble he may cause!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob must figure out how to do his job after accidentally shrinking himself. // Squidward invents a new sport to get back at SpongeBob and Patrick for annoying him.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Squidward gets trapped in an elevator with SpongeBob and Patrick on his way to return a nearly overdue library book.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Cecil shows Patrick his mustache collection. // The Star family brings a mandrake root into their home.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: The family's excited to take Jack to Lake World, Lily's favorite theme park. But when a lackluster day ends with realizing Lily's favorite ride has vanished, the kids must survive a thrilling adventure to find it and save their vacation.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Squidina hosts a television show to pass a home economics class. // Patrick and SpongeBob try to unlock a dull child's imagination.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Stars celebrate Patrick's birthday at the Chum Bucket. // Patrick and Squidina explore Bikini Bottom late at night.

programme.title: For the Love ep 7
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 27
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. As a series of events unfold, he soon discovers that his brother didn't succumb to a heart attack as he was made to believe. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by fear, the congressman's henchmen move unhampered to silence Carding and his brother's orphaned family as well. Big mistake. Armed with only a crusty riffle and a whole ton of rage. Carding sets out to right the wrong and exact vengeance for the murder of his brother. That is, if he survives the hot pursuits of bounty hunters, the militia and the police who are all in the congressman's payroll.

programme.title: Sing Galing: Singlebrity Edition ep 18
programme.desc: Sing Galing: Sing-lebrity Edition, aims to provide fun, laughter, music and excitement with the added goal of helping as celebrities sing and play for their chosen beneficiaries.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 1
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 11
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Destiny Guard ep 10
programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Afterlife ep 6
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 5
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 10
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 9
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
